transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan namaskar Rahul sir, good afternoon, good morning, good afternoon Muskan here.
Customer: Haan ji Muskan.
Executive: Haan ji Rahul sir aapke paas toh mera personal number bhi hai na aap usse call kar liya karo, hota kya hai na yaha pe ticket open ho jati hai aap toh normal kisi kaam ke liye call kar rahe honge but mere paas yaha pe ticket open ho gayi hai aur hua kya mere ko kal remind nahi raha aapne parso call kiya tha tab main bahar thi actually.
Customer: Ji pata hai tha aapne ji ji ji.
Executive: Haan ji warna main aapka phone aisa kabhi hota nahi hai ki main aapka.
Customer: No problem no problem Muskan, main ye keh raha tha Muskan ye there is a city in Punjab, Gurdaspur.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Mujhe waha pe mujhe main bahut try kiya sab jagah try kar liya but I'm not able to find if you could just help me out, waha pe mujhe unipole ya holding ki jo direct agency hai uska number chahiye I'm not sure ki wo IndiaMART pe hai ya nahi but agar aap.
Executive: Unipole, unipole.
Customer: Unipole, U N I P O L E.
Executive: Wait karo. P O L A.
Customer: Uni U N I P O L E pole pole.
Executive: Theek hai wait karo. Theek hai unipole in Gurdaspur.
Executive: Personally mere se toh Punjab mein thode customer hai aap bologe toh main dekh lungi.
Customer: Haan mujhe wahi ka unipole chahiye kyun kyunki baki jo jitne mile na sare trading wale hai ab client local bhi le.
Executive: Holding bhi chalega kya unipole holding.
Customer: Haan unipole holding ji ji ji ji ji wahi.
Executive: Sir yaar iska number dekh nikalega ye toh IndiaMART pe nahi hai banda. Theek hai main iska na ek minute call pe raha hu aap.
Customer: Kya naam hai iska?
Executive: Amanjot Singh.
Customer: Haan nahi nahi company ka naam company ka naam lead berry aisa toh kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Trend and Demine Life Services.
Executive: Wait karo main call karti hu aapke samne call kar rahi hu wait karo hai na. Aap puch lena ki iske paas unipole khud ka hai kya?
Customer: Ek minute call pe lena.
Customer: Kyunki shayad isse meri baat ho rakhi hai I'm not sure.
Executive: Gurdaspur ki company. I'm sorry please. Okay main isko na message dal deti hu ye mujhe message kar dega.
Customer: Theek hai Muskan aaya tha fir bataiyega na mujhe.
Executive: Ek minute call pe raho na main baat kar leti hu.
Executive: Unipole holding ek aur hai Gandhi Dham ka hai lekin ye Rajkot ka hai.
Customer: Aapko Gurdaspur ka hi kyun chahiye keval?
Executive: Kyunki Gurdaspur city mein kisi ek ke paas hi holding ka tender hai aur wo mujhe mil nahi raha client ki requirement Gurdaspur ki hai bas.
Executive: Accha theek hai main aapko ek baar dhund kar deti hu main aapko personal number se message kiya hai dusra naam aur likh do baki sir main yaha se ticket aapki close kar rahi hu request hai please ticket ka feedback aayega yes kar dijiyega ek hi minute ka time lagega usme aapka.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai main kara dunga. Hai na? Okay sir thank you. Main dhund ke aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs contact of unipole/holding agency in Gurdaspur.

- Existing contacts are trading companies, not direct agencies.



Resolution:

- Executive searched for unipole holding in Gurdaspur.

- Executive messaged a contact for information.

- Executive offered to search for more contacts.

- Ticket closed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will search and provide information to customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- unipole, holding, gurdaspur, agency
